scenario_text.value:
I’d say we’ve searched this corner of the
apartment complex top to bottom.

We didn’t spot anything that looked like the
enemy base, huh!

Yeah. Oh, but there’s still the other
building to investigate, right?

(That reminds me, the Professor mentioned
something about that other building...)

Something tells me I should check it out.
You coming with, Agumon?
Of course! Let’s go, go, go!

I bet it’ll be fun to compare this building
to the other one!
